Statistical Modeling: A Fresh Approach (3/ed) Outline
Statistical Modeling: A Fresh Approach (3/ed) Daniel Kaplan 2016-07-25 Outline The outline is going to go here.

To build this book This index.Rmd will always contain the first part of the book. For a Tufte book in HTML, give the following command in the shell: sh _build.sh To get the navigation as a bar, somehow contrive to put these two lines just before the table of contents in the HTML file: <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" type="text/css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" href="toc.css" type="text/css" /> For a PDF file, change _build.sh or just run the following command: Rscript -e "bookdown::render_book('index.Rmd', bookdown::tufte_book2())" To avoid chapter numbering, put {-} after the level-one heading.
